Uses of Package
com.igormaznitsa.prol.annotations

Packages that use com.igormaznitsa.prol.annotations
com.igormaznitsa.prol.easygui The package contains a small GUI editor allows to edit prol scripts and start them. 
com.igormaznitsa.prol.libraries The package contains prolog library related classes, the prol core library is placed in the package. 
 

Classes in com.igormaznitsa.prol.annotations used by com.igormaznitsa.prol.easygui
Determined
          The annotation shows that a function describing a prolog predicate (which one has the annotation before definition) is a determined one and it will be called only one time.
Predicate
          The annotation signals that a function which has the annotation implements a prolog predicate the function can be static or dynamic and it should return boolean or void it must have as arguments Goal and TermStruct
 

Classes in com.igormaznitsa.prol.annotations used by com.igormaznitsa.prol.libraries
Determined
          The annotation shows that a function describing a prolog predicate (which one has the annotation before definition) is a determined one and it will be called only one time.
Evaluable
          The annotation shows that a predicate function (which one has the annotation) can be evaluated when is/2 predicate has been called
ItChangesGoalChain
           
Predicate
          The annotation signals that a function which has the annotation implements a prolog predicate the function can be static or dynamic and it should return boolean or void it must have as arguments Goal and TermStruct
PredicateSynonyms
          The annotation allows to add synonims for a function describing a predicate and you can use the same function to process different predicates if you need
ProlOperators
          The annotation allows to define a few operators
